backend/main.mo: Actor managing user profiles, Stripe checkout/session handling, authorization checks, and booking-related type definitions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, impacted files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files describing component purposes and UI behavior.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base/theme variables with dark‑mode OKLCH palette and shared styling primitives.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level app layout applying ThemeProvider, AccessCodeGate, error diagnostics, and all landing page sections.
frontend/src/components/AccessCodeGate.t: Visual access-code gate requiring code 1122 with animations, session persistence, and manual lock reset.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.t: Admin dashboard showing bookings and placeholder availability tab with admin permission checks.
frontend/src/components/BuildFailureDiag: Displays captured build or deployment errors with stack traces and allows copying or dismissing them.
frontend/src/components/EthicsAndBoundar: Renders a content section outlining ethical boundaries, disclaimers, and user responsibilities.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Provides a styled site footer with a quote and attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Renders the landing hero section with background imagery, decorative overlays, and a title and tagline.
frontend/src/components/InviteGate.tsx: Restricts page access based on an invite token in the URL, showing a locked screen until unlocked.
frontend/src/components/PaymentFailure.t: Shows a cancellation notice after failed payment and offers a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/PaymentSuccess.t: Confirms successful payment, displaying optional booking details pulled from URL parameters.
frontend/src/components/PractitionerAuth: Displays practitioner bio, photo, and social links along with descriptive background information.
frontend/src/components/PriceAndValue.ts: Presents pricing details for a 90‑minute session along with explanatory text about the value of the service.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty placeholder file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/ReadyToBookCTA.t: Displays a call‑to‑action section inviting users to book a session with a styled button linking externally.
frontend/src/components/SectionShell.tsx: Reusable layout wrapper providing consistent spacing, backgrounds, motifs, and optional labels or dividers for sections.
frontend/src/components/SessionStructure: Renders a four‑phase breakdown of the session flow with titles, durations, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Empty placeholder file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/WhatItIs.tsx: Explains what The Clearing™ is, what it is not, and uses structured text and lists to clarify scope and boundaries.
frontend/src/components/WhatToExpect.tsx: Outlines expected outcomes and session behaviors using descriptive text and bullet lists.
frontend/src/components/WhoThisIsFor.tsx: Defines who the service is suitable for and who it is not, presented in two parallel structured lists.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, handling authentication state and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, logging in, clearing identity, and tracking login status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps common backend actor calls in React Query hooks for user profiles, Stripe config, checkout sessions, and bookings with automatic caching and invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive CSS custom properties, typography, dark mode variables, and decorative motif utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, initializing QueryClient and wrapping the app with InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/captureAppErrors.ts: Implements a global error capture utility that records, retrieves, clears, and broadcasts frontend runtime and promise rejection errors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for extracting, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash-routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, shadows, and container settings, plus plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the project’s schema/version and provides a detailed description of the DApp’s frontend, backend, architecture, and known issues. Serves as a high-level project manifest for build planning and state tracking.
